casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Scott ELLIS 281P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2017 Kirby H. Smith, III, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Ellis, Christopher Scott. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of August 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2017."
